summary: A proper nordic currency for your Skyrim game.
descriptionHtml:
It's a quick coin replacer I made by mashing together Bergrisi's face from a modern Icelandic 1 kr with the back of an old 1930's 2 kr. I did it that way to avoid putting any names/words/dates on the coins. The texture is the same size as vanilla.

[b]INSTALL/UNINSTALL[/b]:
To install just drop the meshes and textures folders in your Data files directory,
To uninstall Delete [b]"coin01.nif"[/b], [b]"coin08.dds"[/b], and [b]"coin08_n.dds"[/b].
author: Luna
